title: Hospitality players look to cash in on Rs 850 cr opportunity due to G20 meeting
description: Hospitality players are looking to cash in on a Rs 850-crore revenue opportunity arising out of India's G20 Presidency through delegation-related travel and accommodation requirements, while also looking to consolidate the foundation for future growth.
